conditions.today: 6 AM—A very happy Sunday to all skiers and riders! We're looking a chilly chalky morning with blue bird skies as far as the eye can see. Nary a cloud is anticipated today as the sun rises over the Gros Ventres. Generally light winds out of the west today with some moderate gusts possible during the afternoon hours. Temps will rise to 30 degrees at the base are while the higher elevations stick around the mid-teens. We hope to see you soaking up the sun and laying down turns today - enjoy! - OH
conditions.yesterday: 6 AM—Welcome to the weekend, all you fall-line fanatics. It's time to harness a little bit of "get up and go" because the classic combo of an indigo sky above surreal, wind-sculpted snow is poised to put on another alpine light show. Whether you're totally green or somewhere beyond advanced, the draw of Rendezvous' refracted solar rays will leave you feeling oddly entranced. Cool mountain temperatures will top out around 20 outside Corbet's Cabin and near 30 in Teton Village. Diminishing northwest winds will largely blow in the 5-15 mph range following higher morning gusts. Ultimately, Saturdays were made for all to enjoy. So, grab whatever carving tool you prefer to employ, and let the mountain be your Gentle Giant toy. -Lege

recommendations: Fresh corduroy on Hanna (Lower) - perfect for intermediate skiers

morningBrief.headline: One More Day
morningBrief.body: 115/145 trails spinning, 45 freshly groomed. Variable conditions. 115/145 trails open, 45 groomed. Variable conditions.
